video_title: Families who give the silent treatment
transcript:
this is a home where we don't fight or
argue we just shut down yep I know
there's never any yelling just silence
around here yeah when people are upset
we just give each other the silent
treatment or pretend the issue doesn't
even exist I know and I feel really
abandoned in the process like if I do or
say something wrong I'll just be
abandoned okay here's what I'm learning
avoid conflict at all costs just pretend
like it doesn't exist in 20 years I'll
be completely avoided and will just go
along with anything my partner says so
that I don't cause trouble my own wants
and needs won't matter what will matter
is not creating any situations where
I'll feel rejected or like a burdened
anything to avoid the way I feel in this
home
